headline: Index Exchange Launches Gracenote-Powered Show-Level Reporting with Spectrum Reach
summary: Index Exchange Inc. (Index), one of the world's largest independent supply-side platforms, today announced a new capability with Gracenote, the power behind consumer entertainment search and discovery experiences, that enables show-level transparency for buyers without requiring activation against Gracenote segments. Spectrum Reach is among the first media partners to adopt the solution, bringing premium streaming inventory to market with enriched contextual signals and program-level reporting.

headline: Charter Offers Senior Unsecured Notes
summary: Charter Communications, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHTR) (along with its subsidiaries, "Charter") today announced that its subsidiaries, CCO Holdings, LLC ("CCO Holdings") and CCO Holdings Capital Corp. ("CCO Holdings Capital," and together with CCO Holdings, the "Issuers"), intend to offer senior unsecured notes (the "Notes").
